dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1894 IH: To authorize the extension of preferential tariff treatment for certain textile goods imported from Morocco.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Carney introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To authorize the extension of preferential tariff treatment for certain textile goods imported from Morocco.

section.header: Extension of Tariff Preference Level Program for Morocco

subsection.text: U.S. Note 64(b) to subchapter XII of chapter 99 of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking shall be as follows: and all that follows through As used in this note and inserting shall be 10,000,000 SME for each of the calendar years 2016 through 2025. As used in this note; and
by striking December 31, 2015 and inserting December 31, 2025.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply with respect to articles entered, or withdrawn from warehouse for consumption, on or after January 1, 2016.
